        string password

        string PATH

        number STATUS_CODE
        json RESPONSE_BODY
        string ORIGIN_IP
    }


    USERS ||--o{ USER_GIFTS : owns

    USERS ||--o{ PERSIST_REQUESTS : "made requests"
